title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Acquisition
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Acquisition 
and Possession of Weapons and Ammunition) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 22nd day of July
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (acquisition possession weapon ammunition) (amendment) regulation 2025 (2) regulation shall come operation 22nd day july

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 2. The European Union (Acquisition and Possession of Weapons and
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Acquisition and Possession of Weapons and 

Ammunition) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 209 of 2022) are amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 6(5), by the substitution of “0.0762” for “0.04”, and 

(b) 

in Regulation 8(5), by the substitution of “0.0762” for “0.04”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 July, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 

Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd July, 2025.
